SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
CashierController
CashierController is responsible for managing the behavior and functionality of the cashier interface in the POS system.
DBDriverSingleton
Singleton class that directly interacts with the PostgreSQL database via JDBC calls and converts results into data models.
DBSnapshotSingleton
The DBSnapshotSingleton class is a singleton that maintains snapshots of various database entities such as MenuItems, InventoryItems, Employees, and Orders.
Employee
The Employee class represents an employee in the Panda Express POS system.
InventoryItem
The InventoryItem class represents an item in the inventory for the Panda Express POS system.
InventoryItemWithQty
The InventoryItemWithQty class is a wrapper for InventoryItem, pairing an inventory item with a specific quantity.
LoginApplication
The LoginApplication class is the main entry point for the Panda Express POS application.
LoginController
Controller for handling the login functionality in the Panda Express POS system.
ManagerController
ManagerController is responsible for managing the behavior and functionality of the manager interface in the POS system.
MenuItem
The MenuItem class represents an item on the menu in the Panda Express POS system.
MenuItemToInventoryItem
The MenuItemToInventoryItem class serves as a mapping between a MenuItem and its corresponding InventoryItem.
MenuItemWithQty
The MenuItemWithQty class is a wrapper for MenuItem, associating a menu item with a specific quantity.
Order
The Order class represents a customer order in the Panda Express POS system.
